item.title: Mysql
item.description: 启动mysql : mysqld --console 关闭mysql : mysqladmin -u root shutdown Testing The MySQL Installation : mysqlshow mysqlshow -u root mysql mysqladmin version status proc Connecting to the MySQL Server : mysql --host=localhost --user=myname --password=mypass mydb mysql -h localhost -u myname -pmypass mydb mysql -uroot -p mydb 查看MySQL的当前用户 : SELECT USER(); show global variables like 'port'; 查看所有用户 : SELECT user,host,password FROM mysql.user; 增加新用户 : grant ALL PRIVILEGES on *.

item.title: Linux
